title: Apple iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: The iPhone 15 Pro Max uses Titanium for its frame, which is lighter and stronger than before. The iPhone 15 Pro Max is powered by the A17 Pro chip, a 3nm processor that promises improved performance. A new 6-core GPU that promises the best gaming performance on a phone, complete with ray tracing. The new Action button is coming to the iPhone 15 Pro Max that launches the camera, voice recorder and any app you want, in addition to muting calls.

title: Wireless Rechargeable Mouse 2.4G Plus Bluetooth 2 Modes
description:
Rechargeable Wireless Computer Mouse - This USB LED wireless mouse has a built-in rechargeable 500mA battery. If fully charged, it can be used for about 3 weeks; if the battery is low, the mouse light turns off and the cursor movement slows down or does not move. Please charge in time. Of course, this mouse also has an automatic power saving function. After the mouse is powered on for 8 minutes, if not in use, it will enter sleep mode.

7 Colors RGB LED Breathing Light - This kind of light will not make you dazzling, but it can definitely increase the beauty of the product, especially at night, it can create a cool effect; As long as you turn on the light button, it will automatically switch between different light colors

The response speed is fast, and the keys are resilient.【Ergonomic design】Fits fingers and feels comfortable.[Plug and play] USB interface, no need to drive, easy to use.

title: Mercury Maverick 1550VA UPS
description:
Frequent power interruptions can lead to stress and delays in meeting project deadlines while working on your computer. The Mercury Maverick 1550VA line interactive UPS provides a reliable power back up that enables you save your work the moment there is power interruption or public power outage. It has a wide voltage input range of 140~300VAC with a transfer time of 2 – 6ms and is compatible with generators and the erratic public power supply.

Features
• Built in AVR with wide input range of 140~300VAC
• Auto restart
• Output short circuit protection
• Overload protection
• Overcharge protection
• Sleek and compact design with CPU control
• Green function ( No load cut off )

title: Hisense 43 Inches 4K LED Smart TV
description:
The Hisense 43-Inch Smart Full HD LED TV comes with a sleek design and is very portable for your home. Thinking of setting up a new home as a bachelor or spinster, we believe this Hisense 43-Inch Led TV will perfectly suit your budget or interior decoration plans.
The Hisense 43 Inch Smart Full HD LED TV comes in a sleek Black Color that fits into any background of your choice.
With sharp, powerful sound quality, you have at your fingertips a TV that wouldn't be needing any external audio devices like a Home Theatre or Sound System. 
With Precision color mapping technology, the TV analyses the signal color by 36 degrees of hues, 10 degrees of brightness, and 5 degrees of saturation, then presents the color as real as possible.
With the inbuilt satellite, you can connect your TV to the internet and access a wide array of internet services. Stream music and video on demand, stream football matches, get updates and more.
With the designated button on the remote for all your favorite streaming apps, you are just one button away from the best streaming content, no matter what you are watching or where you are on the TV  interface.

title: LG 32 Inch LM637 Series FHD Smart TV
description:
The LG 32 Inch LM637 Series FHD Smart TV is a sleek and stylish television that offers impressive picture quality and a range of smart features. With its Full HD resolution (1920 x 1080 pixels), this TV delivers sharp and clear images that bring your favorite shows and movies to life. It also has a high refresh rate and a wide viewing angle, so you can enjoy smooth, vibrant visuals from almost any position in the room. As a smart TV, the LG LM637 Series offers a variety of online entertainment options. You can access popular streaming services like Netflix, Hulu as well as a range of apps and games.

 The TV also comes with built-in WiFi, so you can easily connect to your home network and stream content wirelessly.

title: DCQ D1 Power Banks 10000MAh Utra Slim Portable Fast Charger
description:
DCQ D1 Power-Bank, PowerCore Slim 10000, Ultra Slim Portable Charger, Compact 10000mAh External Battery, High-Speed PowerIQ Charging Technology for Mobile phones, ipad, and more.

The New Generation Power-Bank  (10000mAh) is light, convenient and portable. The dual USB output ports support multiple charging protocols, making it a partner in your travels that won't let you down.The Power-Bank  (10000mAh) can charge at up to 18W (12V, 1.5A/9V, 2.0A), cutting back significantly on charging time.

title: Hisense Bluetooth Sound Bar System-HS204
description: Amplify the details with a Hisense sound bar The Hisense 1-piece 30W Sound Bar Home Theater System is the perfect audio solution to bring your music and movies to life. It features 2 channels, Bluetooth® connectivity to wirelessly stream music, an Optical and Audio Input, HDMI Output with ARC, and an easy, hassle-free setup. Use the remote control to operate the sound bar all from the comfort of your favorite chair and mount it on the wall to save space.

title: FURGLE Custom Home & Studio Ergonomic Gaming Chair
description:
Furgle ergonomic gaming chair, all components are of the highest specifications in the industry and comply with European and American standards and SGS certification. Using super-resistant foam sponge, wear-resistant PU leather surface layer, and high-strength steel skeleton with a diameter of up to 22 mm, long-term sitting will not deform and wear, and can effectively reduce the fatigue of long-term games, creating a perfect streamlined aesthetic and Optimal comfort.
【Multi-function & large size】The chair back can be adjusted 90 to 180 degrees backward and the height of the seat can be adjusted to increase the comfort level. You can enjoy the Rocking on the chair.
【Quality Materials & Ergonomics】It is designed with a one-piece high-density sponge and carbon fiber texture. The stain-resistant and fade-resistant PU leather provide ultimate comfort and breathability. The sturdy metal frame bionics provides ergonomic support for the head, waist, and hips. The all-black gaming chair creates a classic aesthetic. The leather texture is clear and natural, with a clear and clean texture, revealing the noble and elegant quality.

title: Gaming Desk, 55 Inch Gaming Table With LED RGB Lights,1.4MTR
description:
RGB LIGHT EFFECT There are LED RGB lights on both sides of the gaming desktop. You can use the buttons to switch between RGB colors, 4 play modes and 10 play speeds according to your preferences. Modes including monochrome, breathing, flashing and Rotating.It can create a cool game atmosphere for you.
LARGE GAMING DESK The size of the gaming desk is 55.1(L) x 23.6(W)x 28.7(H) Inch, and the desktop is large enough for all your gaming equipment. The MDF desktop is waterproof and abrasion resistant, and the matte texture of carbon fiber adds to the game style.
MULTIFUNCTION The gaming table is equipped with headphone hook, double cable hole and cup holder, which can easily organize earphones, water cups and power cords for you. The neat desktop allows you to play more vividly!
R SHAPED FRAME The R shaped desk legs of the gaming desk made of steel form a stable triangular structure, which can bear a maximum weight of 440 pound. The coating on the steel surface can prevent wear and rust. And the antipressure foot pads can prevent scratching the ground.
ELABORATE DESIGNFrom the desktop armor decoration to the printed design of the desk legs, and the ergonomic curved desktop, Mingyall gaming desk is committed to creating the most comfortable and immersive gaming experience for users.
